official_title: An act to authorize the conveyance of the Liberty ship JOHN W. BROWN.

summary.text: (Measure passed Senate, amended) Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to convey the right, title, and interest of the United States in the vessel John W. Brown to a nonprofit corporation for use as a merchant marine memorial museum. Extends from July 1 to August 1, 1983, the date by which a resident alien president or chief executive officer of a vessel's corporate owner must file a declaration of intention to become a U.S. citizen in order to meet vessel documentation requirements.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the conveyance of the Liberty Ship JOHN W. BROWN to the JOHN W. BROWN Preservation Project.
An act to authorize the conveyance of the Liberty ship JOHN W. BROWN.
